metadata.dc:author: Sanchis-Bayarri Bernal, V
Calabuig Alborch, J R
Micó Giner, L
García Gascó, P
Tordera Higón, P
metadata.dc:description: We present the case of a 33 year old man who consulted because a lumbago; a bone lesion was detected on a lumbosacral radiography, and finally was diagnosed of Multiple Myeloma. The illness, diagnosis and epidemiology are briefly analyzed, rebounding the rarity of its presentation in a young man.
metadata.dc:title: Lumbalgia irradiada a pierna derecha como forma de debut de mieloma múltiple en un paciente de 33 años.
[Lumbago radiating to the right leg as a form of onset of multiple myeloma in a 33-year-old patient].
